Report.Description: SQL view [CustomViewLicenseRiskHistory] that reports the history of top license risks by month
Report.SearchSQL: SELECT [SoftwareLicenseID] ,[Year] ,[Month] ,[Name] ,[Version] ,[Edition] ,[PublisherName] ,[ProductName] ,[LicenseType] ,[ComplianceStatus] ,[Purchased] ,[Consumed] ,[Used] ,[ShortfallAvailability] ,[UnitPrice] ,[ChargeBackPrice] ,[ConsumedValue] ,[TrueUpCost] ,[OverStockCost] ,[RiskValue] ,[RiskValueDelta] ,[RiskType] ,[RiskRating] ,[RiskRank] ,[RiskRankDelta] ,[RiskStatus] ,[DateStamp] FROM [dbo].[CustomViewLicenseRiskHistory] ORDER BY [PublisherName], [SoftwareLicenseID], [Year] desc, [Month] desc
